settings.heading: Join Our Growing Team at Galtsand!

settings.text:
We are thrilled to be opening new stores in the United States and expanding our incredible culture.

Galtsand is part of a community — a collection of people with the shared belief that clothes should be functional, beautiful, and worn for years and years. With a legacy tracing back to 1986, we proudly represent the evolution of American Sportswear. Our mission goes beyond products; we aim to weave stories, memories, and legacies into our brand, reflecting our unwavering commitment to quality and heritage. 

  • 1,000+ team members globally
  • Over 35 years in business
  • Proudly American

settings.title: APPLY NOW to be a part of our dynamic and passionate team!
settings.text:
Are You Passionate About Fashion and Sports? Do you thrive in engaging with customers and representing a brand with a rich legacy?

We're on the lookout for enthusiastic, customer-oriented individuals to join our team as Part-Time and Full-Time Retail Store Associates. We're also hiring Managers to lead our new store. 

Why Work with Us? 

At Galtsand, you'll have the opportunity to be part of a brand that blends heritage with contemporary style. If you have a passion for fashion, a commitment to quality, and a desire to contribute to the growth of a renowned brand, we want to hear from you.

settings.heading: APPLY NOW to be a part of our dynamic and passionate team!

settings.text:
Are You Passionate About Fashion and Sports? Do you thrive in engaging with customers and representing a brand with a rich legacy?

We're on the lookout for enthusiastic, customer-oriented individuals to join our team as Part-Time and Full-Time Retail Store Associates. We're also hiring Managers to lead our new store. 

Why Work with Us? 

At Galtsand, you'll have the opportunity to be part of a brand that blends heritage with contemporary style. If you have a passion for fashion, a commitment to quality, and a desire to contribute to the growth of a renowned brand, we want to hear from you.

As a Retail Store Associate, you’ll be responsible for ensuring exceptional customer experiences, maintaining store cleanliness, and driving sales. 

Your primary duties will include: 

Opening and closing the store, ensuring smooth daily operations. 

Engaging with customers to identify their needs and provide exceptional service. 

Actively promoting products and maximizing sales opportunities. 

Maintaining the visual presentation of the store. 

Processing merchandise and helping to plan and execute seasonal events. 

Reporting daily sales progress to management. 

Hosting and coordinating in-store events to promote our brand.

In addition to the responsibilities listed above, our Managers will: 

Develop and implement local marketing strategies to increase store traffic and sales. 

Monitor inventory levels and coordinate with the head office. 

Utilize strong networks and community connections to enhance brand visibility and customer engagement. 

Support the organization and execution of in-person brand events. 

Work with shopping mall staff to coordinate exciting events and public relations opportunities.

settings.title: What You’ll Bring:
settings.text:
Positive attitude and strong customer service skills. 

Ability to adapt to changing situations and prioritize tasks. 

Effective communication skills, both verbal and written. 

Prior experience in retail sales preferred (1-2 years for Associates; more for Managers). 

Ability to lift and move objects weighing up to 15 pounds. 

Basic math skills for inventory management. 

Passion for fashion and staying updated with the latest industry trends. 

Ability to plan and execute promotional events and activities.
